name: Conspiracy (devsaur)
description:
A game about a great conspiracy against humanity, but are these only fake news?   People say Reptilians decide to minimize the humanity and gather some more space on earth for them to live.    Therefore they build a plane and investigate toxic chemicals to mix them with the plane's contrails.  

Do you think they're right?  
Or are you suspicious?    

Find out now:         

  • Move with A and D keys
  • Hold Space for chemtrails
  • In the beginning you have 3 lifes, you can get up to 7 lifes by collecting hot air balloons
  • Birds can hurt you, which'll cost you one life each time you hit one
  • Scientists are searching for you in helicopters, so avoid showing them your chemtrails
